meta.name: description
meta.content: Milton School District is an inclusive and supportive educational community for students, educators, parents, and the community.

li.a: From the Desk of the Superintendent
Report to the Board of Trustees

div.p: Everyone can help stop stigma related to COVID-19 by knowing the facts and sharing them with others in your community. When you share accurate information about COVID-19 you can help make people feel less stressed and allow you to connect with them.

article.aria-label: Cancelled: Milton Community Fun Run - In Color

h3.a: Cancelled: Milton Community Fun Run - In Color

div.div: Everyone can help stop stigma related to COVID-19 by knowing the facts and sharing them with others in your community. When you share accurate information about COVID-19 you can help make people feel less stressed and allow you to connect with them.

Effective 4/6/2020 - All MTSD playgrounds and outside facilities (including the MHS Track) are closed to the public.
MTSD Schools closed for the remainder of the 19/20 school year. Updated 3/26.
Just a reminder that all MTSD School Buildings are closed to the public (parents/students/alumni/community members). Only staff and faculty can enter the buildings.
